H0.text: In 2004, Chechen terrorists took schoolchildren hostage resulting in a shoot-out in which hundreds died, in which city was it. Grozny

H1.text: In 2004, Chechen terrorists took schoolchildren hostage resulting in a shoot-out in which hundreds died, in which city was it. Moscow

H2.text: In 2004, Chechen terrorists took schoolchildren hostage resulting in a shoot-out in which hundreds died, in which city was it. Vladikavkaz

H3.text: In 2004, Chechen terrorists took schoolchildren hostage resulting in a shoot-out in which hundreds died, in which city was it. Bezlan

A4.text: The Beslan school siege began when a group of armed terrorists occupied School Number One (SNO) in the town of Beslan, North Ossetia.
